project_descr: DDR - Strengthening UNDP Effectiveness in DDR

outputs.output_descr: The demand for disarmament, demobilization and reintegration (DDR) of ex-combatants in post conflict settings is increasing, particularly in non-peacekeeping contexts where UNDP often plays a leadership role. The UN approach to DDR is changing, as departments, agencies and funds work to increase their coordination and effectiveness on DDR. UNDP has played a significant role in recent developments and is well positioned to play a central role in the future of DDR within the UN system. This project document identifies likely future trajectories for UN engagement on DDR and proposes the nature an
donor_name: JOINT UNITED NATIONS PROGRAMME ON HIV/AIDS

outputs.output_descr: UN INTER-AGENCY WORKING GROUP ON DDR

project_title: ddr - strengthening undp effectiveness in ddr
